title: Cooler Master Goes Modular With PC Cases!
description: We stop by Cooler Master's to check out their new Q500L, Q500P, Q300L, Q300P, H500p and the NR400 pc cases.  These are some modular marvels!    A special thanks to all our sponsors  Thermaltake Corsair Razer MSI Phanteks  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #q300l #q300p #nr400 #coolermaster #ces2019 #hardwarecanucks
